title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 938.6 - Appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 938.6 - Appeals

State Regulations

An appeal of a denial of an application for exemption to a
judicial hearing officer, pursuant to section 18 of Part 941 of this Title, is
available only to a Client Filer who submitted an application under section
938.4
(a) of this

Part. A Client Filer who submitted an application under section
938.4
(b) of this

Part is not entitled to such an appeal. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
